abstract.text: Combines elements from this publisher with those from four other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.

inlineContent.text: A publisher that emits an event when any upstream publisher emits an event.

when you want to receive a new element whenever any of the upstream publishers emits an element. To receive tuples of the most-recent value from all the upstream publishers whenever any of them emit a value, use
To combine elements from multiple upstream publishers, use
receives input from the upstream publishers, it republishes the interleaved elements to the downstream:
The merged publisher continues to emit elements until all upstream publishers finish.
If an upstream publisher produces an error, the merged publisher fails with that error.

Combine-PageImage-card.png.alt: The Swift language logo, overlaid by a graph of interconnected lines and points.

abstract.text: Customize handling of asynchronous events by combining event-processing operators.
Declares that a type can transmit a sequence of values over time.
The kind of errors this publisher might publish.
The kind of values published by this publisher.
Subscribes to three additional publishers and publishes a tuple upon receiving output from any of the publishers.
Combines elements from this publisher with those from four other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
Combines elements from three other publishers and delivers groups of elements as tuples.
A namespace for types that serve as publishers.
A publisher that provides explicit connectability to another publisher.
Combines elements from this publisher with those from another publisher of the same type, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
Combines elements from this publisher with those from two other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
Combines elements from this publisher with those from three other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
Combines elements from this publisher with those from four other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
Combines elements from this publisher with those from five other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
Combines elements from this publisher with those from six other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
Combines elements from this publisher with those from seven other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
A publisher created by applying the merge function to five upstream publishers.

seeAlsoSections.title: Republishing Elements from Multiple Publishers as an Interleaved Stream
